readability_reflection: I preferred the string concatenation but the interpolation was more readable and looked cleaner comparatively.
comprehension_debugging: Initially I did not understand how interpolation worked since I am used to coding with concatenation. Visually interpolation looked better and if I had more experience with, no questions asked I would prefer that.
preference_rationale: String concatenation because thats just what I am used to doing. Its sort of intuitive for me.
learning_curve: I prefer the one in which I have more experience in which is string concatenation even though the other one seemed better.
suggestions_improvement: I just think its a matter of preference but if people were trained more in the interpolation I think it would be better.
